entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
